summary: An ordinance amending section 1 of Ordinance No. 19724 entitled: "An ordinance granting to Standard Furniture Company, a corporation, the right to place certain conduits beneath the alleys and streets of the City of Seattle, and to conduct steam and electric wiring for light and motor purposes through said conduits, and authorizing the Board of Public Works to issue permits therefor" approved December 15, 1908.
